plot: A young boy, the descendant of an actual pirate, faces his own version of a tyrant king - a school bully who reigns over the kids of Midville with an iron fist.
title: The Midville Pirates
plot_es: A young boy, the descendant of an actual pirate, faces his own version of a tyrant king - a school bully who reigns over the kids of Midville with an iron fist.
plot_en: A young boy, the descendant of an actual pirate, faces his own version of a tyrant king - a school bully who reigns over the kids of Midville with an iron fist.
